version_description:
* Video streaming enhancements
* Adds support for Rower BLE machines
* International launch, including in-app purchase support, in the following countries: Great Britain, Australia, France, Mexico, Norway, Spain, New Zealand, Belgium, Italy, Sweden, Puerto Rico, Netherlands, Portugal, Hungary, Switzerland, Malaysia, Germany, Poland
* Various bug fixes and performance improvements

* Video streaming enhancements
* Adds support for Rower BLE machines
* International launch, including in-app purchase support, in the following countries: Great Britain, Australia, France, Mexico, Norway, Spain, New Zealand, Belgium, Italy, Sweden, Puerto Rico, Netherlands, Portugal, Hungary, Switzerland, Malaysia, Germany, Poland
* Various bug fixes and performance improvements

We’re excited to announce that iFit—Smart Cardio Equipment is now available on mobile! We’ve also made several improvements, including:

• The ability to browse the web or use other apps during a workout
• A new navigation drawer for easier access to settings and secondary accounts
• A better app setup experience
• Performance enhancements and various bug fixes

We’re excited to announce that iFit—Smart Cardio Equipment is now available on mobile! We’ve also made several improvements, including:

• The ability to browse the web or use other apps during a workout
• A new navigation drawer for easier access to settings and secondary accounts
• A better app setup experience
• Performance enhancements and various bug fixes
Fixes an issue that caused users to be logged out of the app frequently
Fixes an issue that caused users to be logged out of the app frequently
Fixes an issue that caused users to be logged out of the app frequently.
Fixes an issue that caused users to be logged out of the app frequently.
Various bug fixes and performance improvements
Various bug fixes and performance improvements

Popular music has arrived! You can now listen to the top hits and your favorite trainer at the same time. Most video workouts include these new tunes.

Important fixes include:
• Showing the correct pace when pedaling at a high RPM
• Displaying the correct time for completed calendar workouts
• Allowing hybrid trainers to start running and cycling workouts
• Enabling the snap-to-road feature for creating map workouts
• Improved functionality for saving workouts
• Improved loading for profile screen
• Decreased timeout for failed login
• Favorited workout remains selected
• Chosen unit of measurement remains selected
• Other various fixes

Popular music has arrived! You can now listen to the top hits and your favorite trainer at the same time. Most video workouts include these new tunes.

Important fixes include:
• Showing the correct pace when pedaling at a high RPM
• Displaying the correct time for completed calendar workouts
• Allowing hybrid trainers to start running and cycling workouts
• Enabling the snap-to-road feature for creating map workouts
• Improved functionality for saving workouts
• Improved loading for profile screen
• Decreased timeout for failed login
• Favorited workout remains selected
• Chosen unit of measurement remains selected
• Other various fixes
This release contains a multitude of performance improvements to make your experience faster and more reliable!  Also includes a fix for slow loading post-workout screens.
This release contains a multitude of performance improvements to make your experience faster and more reliable!  Also includes a fix for slow loading post-workout screens.

Introducing full-screen workout mode! If you don’t want to focus on metrics, you can now concentrate on just you and your trainer. This release also showcases the newly designed side drawer. It’s easier to log out and quickly access your most-used settings and pages. We have also made updates to the in-workout experience, so you can easily navigate to charts and stats screens and a newly designed pause overlay screen.

Introducing full-screen workout mode! If you don’t want to focus on metrics, you can now concentrate on just you and your trainer. This release also showcases the newly designed side drawer. It’s easier to log out and quickly access your most-used settings and pages. We have also made updates to the in-workout experience, so you can easily navigate to charts and stats screens and a newly designed pause overlay screen.

In this release, we made improvements to the workout library load time. We know you want to find and start your workout quickly, so we sped up the load time to be six times faster than before. There’s also some miscellaneous bug fixes and stability improvements to make the overall workout experience better.

In this release, we made improvements to the workout library load time. We know you want to find and start your workout quickly, so we sped up the load time to be six times faster than before. There’s also some miscellaneous bug fixes and stability improvements to make the overall workout experience better.

Improvements to workout uploading. Various other bug fixes and performance improvements.
Improvements to workout uploading. Various other bug fixes and performance improvements.

Introducing new pre-workout, post-workout, and calendar history screens!
• Adds the ability to schedule a workout
• Improved workout overview charts
• Adds additional details about workout
• Improved Workout Uploading and Saving

Introducing new in-workout gestures. Swipe up and down to enter and exit Full-Screen mode while in a workout

Introducing new in-workout gestures. Swipe up and down to enter and exit Full-Screen mode while in a workout
Various bug fixes and performance improvements
Various bug fixes and performance improvements
Various bug fixes and performance improvements
Various bug fixes and performance improvements

Your Home screen has a new, fresh look! You can now view workout ratings, workout tags, and trainer avatars at a glance. Workouts on the home screen will also have the time or date you last completed them, so can easily see what workouts you have done in the past.

New Features:
• Newly designed home screen
• Workout ratings on each workout card
• Tags for easily identifying workout type and style
• Trainer avatars on workout cards
• Easier-to-read metrics and titles
• More precise weekly stats
• Completed workout overlay, displaying time or date the workout was previously completed.

Other Changes:
• Miscellaneous bug fixes
• More seamless handling of activation codes

USE WITH OR WITHOUT EQUIPMENT - You can now use the iFit app with or without fitness equipment. If you don’t own equipment, simply choose a workout and follow along at home! If you do own equipment, pair the app to your machine so your trainer can fully control your workouts.

USE WITH OR WITHOUT EQUIPMENT! Now available on tablet and phone apps: You can now use the iFit app with or without fitness equipment. If you don’t own equipment, simply choose a workout and follow along at home! If you do own equipment, pair the app to your machine so your trainer can fully control your workouts.

We’ve updated our icon as well as changed our app name from “iFit Cardio” to “iFit” for greater recognizability and clarity. Other updates include:

• Strength workouts now automatically enter full-screen mode in order to dispense with irrelevant speed/distance metrics
• Improved performance with multiple bug fixes

USE WITH OR WITHOUT EQUIPMENT! Now available on tablet and phone apps: You can now use the iFit app with or without fitness equipment. We’ve updated our Strength Workouts with a new in-workout user interface to improve calorie burn calculations and metrics visible to the users.

In an effort to make it easier to switch between user profiles, members will now see the account selection screen displayed after a period of inactivity.

Fonts have been updated throughout the application in order to improve overall member usability.

Settings features have been updated throughout the application in order to make it easier for members to manage their account.

We’ve also included a number of backend app updates and fixes that will result in a better user experience.

• Closed captions are now available for all Spanish and English on-demand workouts.
• Members can turn on and off closed captioning during a workout by bringing up the pause screen during a workout.
• If the member would like to change the display language of the closed captioning, they may do so by accessing “Settings” on the main drop-down menu.

• Closed captions are now available for all Spanish and English on-demand workouts.
• Members can turn on and off closed captioning during a workout by bringing up the pause screen during a workout.
• If the member would like to change the display language of the closed captioning, they may do so by accessing “Settings” on the main drop-down menu.

-Members accessing the iFIT on their mobile devices now have the ability to switch the genre of music they are listening to while in a workout.

-Members can change the genre by entering the Music tab during a workout and
using a scroll bar to view the available music genres.

-U.S. users will have access to 11 different stations, including: Pop Throwback, Hip-Hop Throwback, Classic Rock, Uptempo Pop Remixes, Dance/EDM, Top 40, Pop, Rock, Country, '80s Pop, and Downtempo Yoga.

-International users will have access to 4 different stations, including: Global Hits, Dance/EDM, Rock, and Downtempo Yoga.

-Members accessing the iFIT on their mobile devices now have the ability to switch the genre of music they are listening to while in a workout.

-Members can change the genre by entering the Music tab during a workout and
using a scroll bar to view the available music genres.

-U.S. users will have access to 11 different stations, including: Pop Throwback, Hip-Hop Throwback, Classic Rock, Uptempo Pop Remixes, Dance/EDM, Top 40, Pop, Rock, Country, '80s Pop, and Downtempo Yoga.

-International users will have access to 4 different stations, including: Global Hits, Dance/EDM, Rock, and Downtempo Yoga.

Connected Apps
Users can now link their iFIT and Strava accounts to synchronize activity history
Users can now link their iFIT and Apple Health accounts to synchronize activity history
Users can now link their iFIT and Garmin Connect accounts to synchronize activity history
Users can now link their iFIT and Google Fit accounts to synchronize activity history
